item.description:
The Instigators are at Tools Bar and Grill, A new venue for us but no cover and a great band, looks like great food and outside seating...http://www.toolsbarandgrill.com/

Parking @ TOOLS

Abundant metered parking ($.75 per hour, free after 5 p.m. and on weekends) is available on the streets near TOOLS and in the City Garage on Chestnut Street ½ block East of the restaurant.

The parking lot next to TOOLS is a private metered lot available to all TOOLS customers. The charge is $2 per hour from 8 a.m. to 8 p.m., seven days a week  (Free after 8 p.m).

 

 

Looking for a place to be before this music, join us at Stonewell Tavern, Rt. 6 in Farmington for Happy Hour tonight, We will be there until about 7pm. see you soon

Nancy

5083803737

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: The Instigators at Tools Bar and Grill, 136 Main Street in New Britain
